Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We have sequenced the expressed exons of the C6 gene from selected cases and have found three molecular defects leading to total deficiency 879delG , which is the common defect in the Cape and hitherto unreported , and 1195delC and 1936delG , which have been previously reported in African - Americans .

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Total deficiency 879delG |
| Cape |
| 1195delC |
| 1936delG |

Note: The entities are presented exactly as they appear in the original paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Disease" entities identified in the paragraph:

| Disease |
| --- |
| Total deficiency 879delG |
| Cape |
| 1936delG |

I removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease":

* "unreported" (this is a type of disease, but it is not a specific disease name)
* "1195delC" (this is a genetic mutation, but it is not a disease name)
